Изменил свой обзор с смешного недобуругта на более понятный(нет)
Игра стала умирать(но это не точно) Ибо уже все начали покидать эту игру. В начале всего когда я только её купил(с обновления медсестры) меня поразила эта игра. Первый раз вижу такой жанр игры и геймплей тоже. Но потом всё пошло по наклонной вниз. Стали появляться читеры и с даже этот "античит" которые добавили разработчики ничего не меняет. Баги.... Да, это тяжёлая тема ибо багов тут навалом, а разработчикам всё ровно на мнение игроков. Но главное надо добавить немножечко ДЛС и срубить бабла с этого и забыть про все невзгоды игроков. Обещают и обещают, а сделать не могут. Эх.. Надеюсь разработчики сей чудесной игры обратят внимания и всё исправят, но на это полагаться не стоит.(как всегда ещё пару десятков ДЛС выпустят)

Игра напряженная и интересная несмотря на то, что смысл в ней довольно простой, конечно если не попадаются скучные личности в катке и если пытаться реально научиться играть. Но даже так, игра однозначно стоит своих денег и потраченого времени. В общем советую!

Might be, of course, because of my lack of knowledge or maybe this is a clitch(?) in Steam system, dunno, but hell... I cannot remove the game nor play it from my system, and more important - I cannot PAY for it.... hah. Good game, I saved some money.
I still recommend this, as I hear it is good. It is just that I have some strange, problems, having this... "Here is my money, take it" - the answer: "No, sorry, your money is no good..." FFS ;)
Cheers...

首先我强烈要求增加拔线惩罚短期内超过3次就直接封号什么的，不要拿什么网不好当借口，不会自己弄个稳定网又快的WIFI？自己掉线了然后恶心队友？不好意思，说恶心屠夫的，你怕是不知道屠夫嘴都笑歪了，掉线直接算做1个人头，你说屠夫开不开心，特别是那些开局，自己猪，1分钟不到就让砍翻在地然后直接原地拔线的，像这样的废物为什么要来玩这种游戏？玻璃心为什么要一次次把自己的傻缺暴露给别人看？有快感？真的是没法看，有些人的游戏素质，啧啧，希望官方能有所作为吧，之前就说要惩治，然后呢，掉线会掉段这没毛病，但对那些已经习惯性“掉线”的人能不能干脆封ID？你说什么？人花了钱怎么可以随便封呢？FNNDP！还有屠夫也同理，一上来掉线其他4个人原地掉段，，，6666至少这种情况人类保持原有段位不变是最合理的，你游戏出了有2年了，到现在还不知道这些最基本的平衡要素么，对，没错说的就是你GM，爱之深责之切，我要不是因为真的喜欢这款游戏，才懒得在这跟你BB这么多

Зашёл я тут с другом "Поиграть"
*Поиск лобби*
-Долго
-Нет
-Да
-ММ ищется дольше
-...

*Лобби подключено. Ожидание других игроков*
-А вон тот на Киркорова похож
-*рукалицо*

*Начинается игра*
-Чё делать?
-Ищи генератор и начинай его чинить

*Мы его починили*
-А чё теперь делать
-Ищи другой генератор
-А что потом?
-Почини его
-Опять?
-Снова

*Нашего посадили на крюк*
-Что случилось?
-Кого-то подвесили
-И?
-Ну спаси его

*Мы нашли тот самый крюк. Рядом стоял маньяк*
-СТОЯТЬ!!!
-???
-Видишь вон того пид0ра?
-Ага
-Он тебя увидит, тебя ждёт учесть, как того чувака
-Так это же Киркоров
-... 
Просто посиди тихо

*Маньяк ушёл*
-Бегом спасай чувака

*Мы попались на капкан*
-Чё она орёт, как бешенная?
-Может потому что ты попал на капкан?
-Ой
-Спасайся!!

*Только выбравшись из капкана, мы увидели маньяка. Мы чувствовали, что нам 3.14здец*
-БЕГИ!!!
-КУДА???
-Я НЕ ЗНАЮ, НО ПО ДАЛЬШЕ ОТ ТОГО УРОДА!!!

*Мы спрятались в шкафу. Он перебрал все шкавчики, но наш не заметил. В это вермя мы перебирали всех богов, которых знали*
-3... 2... 1... Он ушёл. Вылезай

*Мы пошли чинить генератотры. Нас осталось трое*
-Вон генератор чинят. Иди помоги

*Только подошли, генератор сломали*
-БЕГИ!!!
-КУДА???
-ПРОСТО БЕГИ

*Маньяк нас поймал*
-ААААААААА
-ААААААААА
-ЧТО ДЕЛАТЬ???
-ПЫТАЙСЯ ВЫБРАТСЯ!!!

*У нас ничего не получилось. Висим мы на крюке*
-АААААААААА
-АААААААААА
-И чё делать?
-То же, что и делали в шкафу

*Нас чудом спасли*
-Счастья и благополучия тебе, спаситель наш
-...

*Немного попотев, мы починили все генераторы. Нас было двое*
-Видишь рычаг?
-Угу
-Беги к нему

*Мы открыли рычаг. Маньяк яростно бежит к нам*
-БЕГИ ТУДА!!!
-КУДА?
-КУДА ТЫ ОТКРЫЛ!!
-БЕГУ!!!

*Нас поймали*
-Ты идиот! Тебя учили жать Shift?
-Ну да
-Почему ты его не нажал???
-Я не знаю
-...

*Мы повисли на крюке. Второй сбежал. В итоге мы погибли*
-И так каждый раз?
-Только ещё Shift-ом пользуются
-[b]Игра офигенна[/b]

played in a match with 1 friend.

both of us stupidly get caught by killbilly and get thrown in the basment for our sins.My soon to be dead friend reminds me that he used an offering called " a jar of salty lips" which increases our chances of escaping the hook ourselves.

so i look at our other 2 random team mates, theyre ignoring us.

my friend tries to escape the hook 3 times, no such look and hes nearly dead now, i try 2 times no luck either
i look over to my pal and hes nearly dead one last try.............

ESCAPED and i run to my friend with a milisecond remaining and hes saved as well

we heal each other up and escape his nasty dungeon.

we escape this hellish ordeal whilst laughing at the 2 guys who refused to help us get downed and hooked instantly

10/10 would get hooked again

this game sucks.

Dead by Daylight is a third-person multiplayer horror game developed and published by Behaviour Interactive on June 14, 2016

PROS:
- Gameplay is very solid and fun, mechanics work well together for a experience I have yet to feel in any other game
- Kill your friends lobbies are hilarious trying to hide or kill your friends
- Working together to escape from the killer can be satisfying
- Killing all four of the survivors as the killer can be satisfying
- Each killer has their own unique ability and sometimes even playstyle. My personal favorites being Michael Myers and the Oni.

CONS:
- Super toxic community, especially as you climb higher in ranks
- Progression in this game sucks, having to get through 20-30 levels just to get some good perks is just too grindy for my liking
- Other than perks, nothing makes the survivors stand out from each other (The only exception being Bill from Left 4 Dead) They don't have unique abilities like the killers do
- The offerings mechanic, some are nice like the bloodpoint boost, while others make for frustrating matches like the memento mori
- When it comes to releasing new content, the survivors always seem to get the shorter end of the stick
- The developers seem to favor making new DLC rather than fixing or tweaking things with the game itself, greed always makes consumers mad
- The matchmaking is an absolute f@cking joke. I am so sick and tired of waiting 5-10 minutes at a time for one single game.

FINAL VERDICT: 6/10
As you can tell by my hours, I absolutely loved this game when it came out, but its difficult to enjoy it in its current state. Until they fix the matchmaking AT LEAST, I can't give it any higher of a score

Разработчики всегда в теме игры,интересные события(ивенты) которые не вводят особый донат для получение особых,интересных внутри-игровых предметов.

[b]Приятной игры и Удачи!
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1116002145

Well, theres a few things needed to be put out there on the steam community. Dead by Daylight is a fun, scary, and entertaining game. If you play with friends, good for you, the game is even more fun. But when you play online, thats where the problems come in. 
1. Click Join Lobby
2. Joing game
3. (I grew a beard by now) Failed to join game!
>:O
Thats one thing that i hate about this. Also, the matchmaking needs work, you should be able to get the same ranked people when playing alone (Not inviting anyone) because if theres a different rank, theres a chance where that killer or pair of survivors could have 10x more powerful perks, items, offerings, etc. I just think the matchmaking needs to be fixed. Next thing, the BS occurances like a killer hitting you over a palet or you jump through a window but still hits you from far. Now thats for survivor, sometimes when you play as killer, the survivor you have on your shoulder disconnects, you cant attack, drop him/her, all you can do is walk. :/ Then, you hit them down and then wallah, they somehow escape from you because the killer cant grab the person by the legs and drag someone crawling. I don't care if the "Entity" prevents you from doing so and so, it's bullcrap and should not be tolerated. Then theres the newest killer.... The nurse. OH MY GOD. SHE IS THE MOST, OP KILLER OF ALL TIME. She has a power to "blink" or teleport through walls and everything. Now newcomers must be thinking, wow thats way too powerful, but theres a "balance." Whenever she blinks a certain amount of times (Depending on the add-ons you have) she gets sort of stunned and looks down and can't really do much. But NO THATS NOT TRUE, SHE CAN BE FRICKING STUNNED BUT CAN GRAB YOU OFF PALETS AND WINDOWS! WHAT THE HELL IS THAT!!!!!!!! MY GOD. She also has this terrifying perk called the nurses calling that lets her see people being healed at a certain range, but it's balanced. But just to finish this really long review, this game is fun, funny, scary, whatever. Although the price is quite high, I think its worth the buy now, then what it might be when its done. Might be $60 for all I know.

Tally Ho' Lovelies!

Streamed this game a couple of times and I absolutely love it! I can't get enough of it. First time I played the game I actually involuntarily jumped three times in a row! Pretty embarrasing but worth it. 

The only downside is the loading lobby....that can take a while but if you can preoccupy yourself whilst this happens then you have got yourself a brilliant game! 

If you have up to four other friends you can play a 'private match' or simply play with some of your friends with other people online too...both versions of gameplay are awesome! I have tried both and it is certainly an experience. 

If you have any questions about the game I am more than happy to answer! I love horror games :D


**Update since release** Lobby times are amazingly better! I know of no other games that constantly bring fresh new DLC updates to the game as much and as quickly as this game.

Комьюнити на уровне Dota 2.

I'll keep this review simple.

The game itself is pretty decent and fun , but there was some clear balancing issues.

A couple perks you can unlock are a bit overpowered. Not in the sense of it naturally being overpowered by itself, but if you couple it with another perk it'll suddenly become almost broken in some ways.
It will then boil down to the killer putting survivors in situations there is no counter for leading to some outright BS moments.

Now the developers have been listening to the community and have been tweaking skills left and right, but that is also another problem.
The developers listen to the community, way too much.
And the community, quite frankly, complains about EVERYTHING.

Survivors jumping through windows? They complain.
Survivors rescuing people from hooks? They complain.
Survivors destroying said hooks? They complain.
Survivors playing with friends? They complain.
Survivors actually doing the objective and trying to repair the generators? Oh you better believe they complained!

Now the community forums is littered with people complaining abour survivors or complaining about killers.

But hey. We're getting Micheal Myers!
People will just complain it's not Jason though.

とても素材の良いゲーム。
しかしバグまみれだったり、iniをいじるだけでウォールハックなどができたり、バランスがひどかったり、切断対策が無かったり、ランクシステムがバグってる上に元々ゴミだったり、PTと野良の絶大な差に配慮していなかったりで、まともに遊ぶのは難しい。
特にバランスに関しては運営は常によくわからない調整をしていて、これからもそうするよう。
運営の発言は二転三転する上に明らかな嘘もつくのではっきりとは言えないが、基準は統計データとのこと。
公開された統計データによると、最弱のキラーとされるクラウンでも殺傷率は60%に届き、運営的には50%がゴールなのだとか。なんだそりゃ。

しかし、根本的なシステムとしては間違いなくキラーが不利だ。
1 vs 4 の非対称対戦で両サイドに同じだけのポテンシャルを与えてしまうと4人分のパワーを無駄なく束ねられる1が常に勝てるのである程度は仕方がないが、現状でも実際のゲームプレイとしてはサバイバーがまともに動いた場合、キラーは基本的に太刀打ちできない。
これ自体は非対称対戦そのものの構造的欠陥で、両サイドにとってまともなゲーム、つまり頑張れば勝てるというのは勝利条件を特殊にしない限り不可能。
キラーが頑張れば全滅を狙えるというのは、サバイバー側にとってのクソゲーとなる。そして現状はその逆。

そうなると、キラー側はある程度プレイヤースキルや情報力が無いと手を出しにくい。一方てきとーにやれるサバイバー。
仕様上は間違いなくキラー側が圧倒的に不利だが、その辺りにははっきり殺傷率に表れるほどの差がある。
だからまあなんとかキラー側のプレイヤーは頑張っていた。その頑張りがナーフという形で報いられることになったが。
努力を否定されたキラー側のモチベーションは当然死に、マッチング時間は伸びる。そしてそのしわ寄せはマッチングのバグにより初心者キラーにぶつけられる。
最近はそんな流れです。


あと統計にはメメント・モリという強力な消費アイテムによる結果も含んでいる。BP(経験値)的には得をしないが、とりあえず殺せるアイテム。
突っ込まれてあとあと訂正したが、当初は切断したプレイヤーがいる試合も統計に入れているとの表記も。訂正内容が本当かは不明。
高ランクに限った統計もあるが、処刑率が低いとその高ランクから転落するので意味は不明。明らかに統計をうまく利用できていない。
アーカイブという、試合中にこうしろああしろというミッションシステムが最近追加された。なので無駄な動きをする理由が増えた。
意思疎通のできない野良とボイスチャットで連携するPTの差が大きすぎる。

などなどいろいろ問題があって、そもそも統計は無意味だと思う。
あと表が見にくい。

プレイヤースキルを一切考慮に入れず、無意味な統計のみを基準に調整してしまうと実際のゲームプレイ上は問題が起こるが、統計公開後の調整や調整案を見るに、どうもそうするつもりのよう。なんでだろう。

one of the best survival games ive played in a long while. waiting for a game needs to be improved on. takes ages to find one game lol. and needs to be more balance cant have a lvl 30 killer and me who is only lvl 7 the peaks he has can easily find and kill me without any effort. last thing is if someone disconnect let someone else join the game not make it easier for the kille to win! aside from that the game is worth the buy!

游戏内容非常简单，但是可玩性极高。每一个屠夫都有自己的特殊技能及附加品以增强些许能力，人类同样如此。
所有玩家都在互相斗智斗勇，同时每个玩家不同的玩法也让游戏乐趣增添了很多。
唯一一点，我不太认同游戏定义为恐怖游戏。对于第一次接触这个游戏的人来说bgm及画面都很压抑，被屠夫追的时候的心跳、被玩家溜时振奋的音乐都给这个游戏增添了不少恐怖氛围。但是对于老玩家来说，更像是一种调节气氛的兴奋剂。
我是通过各直播平台主播了解的这款游戏。看了好久才刚刚入手，不建议大家购买所有的DLC,82+免费足够了。dlc多了一些人类服饰、屠夫武器和原声音乐。没有收藏癖的人就不要买了。
As glitchy and buggy it is, as more attractive and obsesive is it! 9.5/10
if you are a fan of the hunger games then you will love this game :P

[u]Pro:[/u]
[list]
[*]Es macht süchtig und es kommt keine langeweile auf.
[*]Immer wieder gibt es neue Spannung, weil man nicht weiß, wie der Killer spielt, und welchen Killer er spielt.
[*]Mit einem guten Team ist man so gut wie unbesiegbar, sie helfen dir und retten nicht nur deren eigenen Hintern, sie sind Teamfähig.
[*]Man muss sich konzentrieren und taktisch vorgehen um eine Flucht zu erzielen.
[*]Es gibt hilfreiche Items, die man für den weiteren Spielverlauf benötigt.
[*]Perks erleichtern dir das Spiel.
[*]Mit Freunden größere Chancen zu gewinnen und doppelter Spielspaß.
[/list]

[u]Kontra:[/u]
[list]
[*]Die Killer sind meist nur hinter einem her.
[*]Die meisten Killer campen.
[*]Die meisten Überlebenden retten nur ihren eigenen Hinteren und lassen dich hängen, sie halten es nicht für nötig Teamwork zu betreiben.
[*]Es gibt immer mehr OP-Killer.
[/list]

Dead by Daylight verbessert sich stetig und falls es irgendein Problem gibt, kann man sich bei den Entwicklern melden, sie gehen darauf ein!

Ich spiele es schon eine ganze Weile und auch wenn das Spiel hier und da kleine Fehler hat oder Fehler die durch den Ping entstehen, ist das Spielkonzept erstklassig und das Spiel schafft es immer wieder dass mein Adrenalin ansteigt und mein ganzer Körper zittert. Aber ich liebe es. :D Ich würde zu gerne bei dem Team arbeiten um meine Ideen einzubringen.
Neue Killer und neue Maps, die genauso grausam sind wie die bereits existierenden.^^

Ich kann das Spiel einfach nur empfehlen. Das Kräfteverhältnis zwischen Killer und Überlebende ist sehr ausgeglichen. Natürlich spielen die Perks eine sehr große Rolle wie gut man spielt und vor allem wie man mit dem Killer umgehen kann, aber dasselbe gilt für die Überlebenden. Daher kann das Spiel immer anders ausgehen.^^

Ein Top-Spiel und ein Riesen Spaß sind hier vorprogrammiert. Spiele es mit deinen Freunden und lasse einen den Killer sein um zu sehen wie die Person in Wirklichkeit ist. ;)

별 이상한 것에  패널티를 줘서 게임성 말아먹은게임....

실명,기절까지는 당연히 생존을 위해서는 살인마가 안고가는게 맞는데

창문넘기같은거에 패널티줘서 살인마보고 산 사람들 짜증나게 만듬... 
창문만 넘어도 생존성이 거의 확보가 되는데 긴장감이 있는가? 인성존 막아도 창문만 있으면 세미 인성존 완성이다.

또 온갖버그가 난무하고 재수없게 생존4인팟 만나면 답이없음...  

결론은...살인마 패널티를 인성질 할 수밖에 없는부분에 줘버렸다...

p.s 살인마 못하면 생존자나 하라고 하는것은 게임 망하게 (살인마 양성을 막는)하는 지름길이다.

[b]Updated as of 7/25/2018[/b]
Updated review finally. It's still a no. 

[h1]Pros[/h1][list]
[*] Myers
[*]Spooky for your first 60ish hours
[*]Closets!
[*]Great graphics
[*]Decent optimazation
[*]Music fits in well with the game
[*]Killers are able to be clearly pointed at from movies and yet have their own thing that makes them slightly different
[*]Game play is fun for your first 60 hours[/list]

[h1]Cons[/h1][list]
[*] Aura reading perk for just about...everything.
[*]Camping / "Patrolling"
[*]Gen rush
[*]Devs nerf everything with a sludge hammer instead of applying gentle tweeks, a heavy knee jerk reaction
[*]After game chat
[*]Decent optimazation 
[*]No dedicated servers
[*]Killer hosted games
(Lag switching, host dcing, etc)
[*]Exploits all over the place[/list]

Okay. So I finally updated this after giving the game some more time to fix the issues. Infinites have been patched out for awhile, so if you want to play killer you can now have a lovely time with it, except for pallet loops. (For those that don't know what a pallet loop is, it's when a survivor will run around a pallet ((an object meant to be dropped in order to slow the killers progress)) constantly in order to waste even more of the kilers time. So if you like running in circles like a rabid dog this is the game for you. 

Now onto survivors. Did you want a game where you hide from the killer instead of running around like a crackhead trying to find a fix? Did you want to feel immersed in the amazing environment and have butt clench moments where the killer walks right past you? Not today Satan. The killer has perks that alerts him to your every move. You fix a gen, he knows. You start to fix a gen, he knows. You try to open a door, he knows. You finish a gen, and he sees your aura. He looks someone, he knows where you are. You're immersed in a bush? He hears those whispers. You're trying to heal far away? Hear heartbeat? Better stop healing or else he knows...but if he has monitor & abuse he probably already knows. 

Did you want to hide? 

You're playing the wrong game. Run around like a crackhead and enjoy your free torture sim. 

Now that he caught you because he got free information through various aura reading and/or tracking perks. (Not because he actually found you) You will now have the pleasure of being hard camped or soft camped by the killer, or if he has the aura reading perk that everyone does, he'll sprint over, down an ally and then sprint back just to check to make sure you're still on the hook. Now if you're still there on the hook he might camp you or if he's not sweaty (which is the DBD term for absolute try hard) he'll go hook the person he just downed. 

Having fun? No? Yes? 

I have bought this game for a few friends and the above mentioned thing has been their experience in the first few hours of the game, making them no longer play. In a way you are responsible for your own fun but the killer has so many tools to find you, it becomes a match of will the killer allow you to do anything but hang from a hook? Still want to play? Great! Buy game, get camped, refund game and then complain on the forums even though you read this review warning you in advance of what's going to happen. 

As to why I still play....I'm a masochist and don't feel like playing Dark Souls again. 

Praise the sun. Have a nice day.

Прекрасный вариант, чтобы выплеснуть стресс за маньяка.
Куча неясных моментов в основном из-за багов, но игра за маньяка это просто нечто (маньячил на траппере). Задолбали уже чуваки, которые отключают сетевой кабель для того чтобы не быть повешенным - штраф для них слишком маленький (-3ранга по-моему), пусть минусуют еще и blood point. А так играбельно.
С друзьями за выживших, чувствую будет больше эмоций.
